name: lintroller
description: Lint your JavaScript code and output errors to a log file. Convenient for pre-commit hooks and build systems to maintain code quality.
readme:
OVERVIEW:
  - LintRoller is a Node.js module that recursively dives into a directory and lints your JavaScript files.

  - Available linting platforms include:
    - JSLint
    - JSHint
    - Esprima

  - An example shell script (test.sh, test.bat) is provided to run the test.js demo.



For full documentation, view /docs/index.html in your browser.



Also see the NPM page for more details:
  - https://npmjs.org/package/lintroller
